Uses of Package
oogasalad.editor.controller

Packages that use oogasalad.editor.controller
Package
Description
oogasalad.editor.controller
 
oogasalad.editor.model
 
oogasalad.editor.view
 
oogasalad.editor.view.tools
 
  • Classes in oogasalad.editor.controller used by oogasalad.editor.controller
    Class
    Description
    CollisionDataManager
    Manages the Collision Event related data of a specific object.
    CustomEventDataManager
    Manages the Custom Event related data of a specific object.
    EditorController
    Defines the primary interface for interaction between the Editor View and the Editor Model/Data.
    EditorDataAPI
    Provides an API to manage editor data by interfacing with the various underlying data managers.
    EditorEventDataManager
    Abstract class for managing event data (conditions, outcomes, and their parameters) associated with EditorObjects.
    EditorEventHandler
    Handles editing of events, conditions, and outcomes associated with editor objects.
    EditorObjectPlacementHandler
    Handles the placement of new objects (both standard and from prefabs) in the editor.
    EditorObjectQueryHandler
    Handles querying editor objects, including retrieval by ID and finding objects at specific coordinates.
    EditorPrefabManager
    Manages the creation, saving, and loading of prefabs (Blueprints) to/from XML files.
    HitboxDataManager
    Manages hitbox data for editor objects by providing methods to access and modify various hitbox properties such as position, dimensions, and shape.
    IdentityDataManager
    Manages identity-related data for EditorObjects, including name, group, and layer information.
    InputDataManager
    Manages the Input Event related data of a specific object.
    PhysicsDataManager
    Manages the Physics Event related data of a specific object.
    SpriteDataManager
    Manages sprite data for EditorObjects, providing methods to access and modify the x and y coordinates of an object's sprite.
